name: AutoFantasy - Desktop Toy
description:
A Windows Desktop Toy RPG 

Round up a classic RPG party to defend your desktop from invaders!

Features:

  • Party count of 4
  • Save System
  • Opacity Slider
  • Monitor Switching
  • Resolution Support??? (this is hard ya'll)

Future Plans:

  • More Jobs
  • Monster Enemies
  • An Item System (and maybe some furniture??)
  • UI Borders
  • Unlockable palettes!
